definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat

sentences.english: Mixed Corn and Grains, Egg Yolk & Lotus Paste, Imperial Pineapple.
sentences.chinese: 五穀雜糧，蛋黃白蓮，至尊鳳梨。

sentences.english: Wrap each blob in plastic wrap and refrigerate.
sentences.chinese: 將每份雜糧團用塑料袋包裝並放入冰箱冷藏。

sentences.english: Crackers labeled multigrain may not have whole grains at all.
sentences.chinese: 標有雜糧標誌的餅乾可能根本不含有全麥。

sentences.english: The planting and consuming of the crops other than wheat and rice has aroused more and more concern of the people.
sentences.chinese: 小雜糧的種植和消費已越來越受到人們的關注。
沒有五穀雜糧人類就不能生存。

sentences.english: Rice and wheat flour are refined food while other beans & grains are coarse food in China.
sentences.chinese: 大米和小麥被稱爲細糧，其它糧食就成了粗糧或雜糧。

sentences.english: Depending on the special feature of higher nutrition and medical value, minor food crops possess huge industrialization potential.
sentences.chinese: 小雜糧營養豐富，醫食同源，極具產業化開發潛力。

sentences.english: Limited by natural conditions, minor crops can only be planted in mountainous area.
sentences.chinese: 受自然環境制約，山區只能種植小雜糧。

sentences.english: Eat more fruits, vegetables, and whole grains, and eat fewer high-fat foods.
sentences.chinese: 多喫水果，蔬菜，五穀雜糧以及低脂食物。

sentences.english: North research Cereal was named brand and brand-name products in Liaoning Province.
sentences.chinese: 北研雜糧被評爲遼寧省名牌產品和名牌農產品。

sentences.english: Nine dans rice, eight sacks maizes, ten sacks coarse cereals.
sentences.chinese: 米九石，玉蜀黍八袋，雜糧十袋。

sentences.english: The means of rough processing for small grains are mainly divided into shelling and sorting.
sentences.chinese: 小雜糧粗加工主要包括脫殼和分選過程。

sentences.english: Men can not always eat flour and rice, it is good for health to eat some cereals.
sentences.chinese: 人不能總喫細糧，喫點五穀雜糧也是有益健康的。

sentences.english: A bowl of high-fiber, multigrain cereal, lots of strawberries, and low-fat milk on top.
sentences.chinese: 一碗高纖維雜糧麥片，大量草莓和低脂牛奶。

sentences.english: Men can not always eat rice, it is good for health to eat some cereals.
sentences.chinese: 人不能總喫白米飯，喫點五穀雜糧也是有益健康的。

sentences.english: There is good foreground of development for the coarse cereals in world.
sentences.chinese: 雜糧在國內外有很好發展前景。
